content: REMINDER The CDA Management Group is seeking an additional member from the EHR Community to join our team. If you are in a position to represent the interests and perspectives of an EHR implementer with respect to using CDA for interoperability, and you would like to learn more about what it means to serve as a representative on the CDA Management Group, please reach out to @Lisa Nelson or @Linda by the end of August, 2021.
